specialRules.name: Cleave (2)
specialRules.description: Enemy Stands in contact with this Stand reduce their Defense Characteristic by 2 when making Defense rolls against Hits inflicted by this Stand.

specialRules.name: Impact (3)
specialRules.description: When this Stand performs a successful Charge Action, before its Clash Action, it inflicts a number of automatic Hits equal to its Impact value.

specialRules.name: Powerful Presence
specialRules.description: This [Character] Stand counts as 3 Stands for the purposes of Seizing Objective Zones.

specialRules.description: When this Stand performs a successful Charge Action, before its Clash Action, it inflicts a number of automatic Hits equal to its Impact value.

specialRules.name: Forward Force
specialRules.description: The non-Monster Regiment this Character Stand is currently attached to gains the Flank Special Rule.

specialRules.name: Quicksilver Strike
specialRules.description: A Character Stand with this Special Rule resolves all of its Attacks first during a Duel Action.

specialRules.name: Powerful Presence
specialRules.description: This [Character] Stand counts as 3 Stands for the purposes of Seizing Objective Zones.

specialRules.name: Deadly Blades
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, any failed Defense Roll of "6" rolled by the Target Regiment causes it to suffer 2 Wounds instead of 1.

specialRules.name: Barrage (3) (14", Deadly Shot)
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a Volley Action, making a number of Attack rolls equal to its Barrage value. Has Deadly Shot special rule.

specialRules.description: This Regiment or Character Stand can perform the Spellcasting Action during its Activation with 6 dice.

specialRules.description: Whenever this Regiment makes a Defense Roll, treat 1 failed result as a success.

drawEvents.name: Monstrous Inspiration
drawEvents.description: Pick one Ideal Card Effect this [Character] is currently under the effects of. Until the end of the Round, while a Friendly Regiment is within 8" of this [Character] it gains the benefits of that Ideal Card Effect.

specialRules.name: Cleave (2)
specialRules.description: Enemy Stands in contact with this Stand reduce their Defense Characteristic by 2 when making Defense rolls against Hits inflicted by this Stand.

specialRules.name: Impact (2)
specialRules.description: When this Stand performs a successful Charge Action, before its Clash Action, it inflicts a number of automatic Hits equal to its Impact value.

specialRules.name: Enlightened
specialRules.description: The first time this Regiment would become Broken during the Battle, the Regiment performs an out-of-sequence Rally or Combat Rally Action at the end of the Action that caused it to become Broken.

commandSpecialRules.name: Enhanced Attacks
commandSpecialRules.description: The Regiment adds +1 to its Attacks Characteristic and gains the Juggernaut Special Rule.

specialRules.name: Trample (2)
specialRules.description: At the end of this Regiment's Activation, if this Regiment is in Contact with an Enemy Regiment in its front arc, this Special Rule causes 2 additional Hits.

specialRules.name: Impact (2)
specialRules.description: When this Stand performs a successful Charge Action, before its Clash Action, it inflicts a number of automatic Hits equal to its Impact value.

specialRules.name: Enlightened
specialRules.description: The first time this Regiment would become Broken during the Battle, the Regiment performs an out-of-sequence Rally or Combat Rally Action at the end of the Action that caused it to become Broken.

commandSpecialRules.name: Enhanced Evasion
commandSpecialRules.description: Stands in the Regiment add +1 to their Evasion Characteristic and gain the Tenacious (1) Special Rule.

specialRules.name: Flawless Strikes
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, all Hit Rolls of "1" count the Target's Defense as 0 for that Attack.

specialRules.name: Impact (2)
specialRules.description: When this Stand performs a successful Charge Action, before its Clash Action, it inflicts a number of automatic Hits equal to its Impact value.

specialRules.name: Enlightened
specialRules.description: The first time this Regiment would become Broken during the Battle, the Regiment performs an out-of-sequence Rally or Combat Rally Action at the end of the Action that caused it to become Broken.

commandSpecialRules.name: Terrain Mastery
commandSpecialRules.description: The Regiment ignores the effects of Hindering Terrain and gains the Vanguard (4) Special Rule.

specialRules.name: Barrage (4) (14", Armor Piercing (1), Rapid Volley)
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a Volley Action, making 4 Attack rolls. Has Armor Piercing (1) and Rapid Volley special rules.

specialRules.name: Enlightened
specialRules.description: The first time this Regiment would become Broken during the Battle, the Regiment performs an out-of-sequence Rally or Combat Rally Action at the end of the Action that caused it to become Broken.

commandSpecialRules.name: Defensive Resilience
commandSpecialRules.description: When this Regiment becomes the Target of an Enemy Regiment's Volley Action it gains the Tenacious (1) Special Rule until the end of that Action. In addition, the Regiment gains the Vanguard (4) Special Rule.

specialRules.name: Cleave (1)
specialRules.description: Enemy Stands in contact with this Stand reduce their Defense Characteristic by 1 when making Defense rolls against Hits inflicted by this Stand.

specialRules.name: Impact (2)
specialRules.description: When this Stand performs a successful Charge Action, before its Clash Action, it inflicts a number of automatic Hits equal to its Impact value.

specialRules.name: Flurry
specialRules.description: A Stand with this Special Rule Re-Rolls all failed Hit Rolls when performing a Clash or Duel Action.

specialRules.name: Enlightened
specialRules.description: The first time this Regiment would become Broken during the Battle, the Regiment performs an out-of-sequence Rally or Combat Rally Action at the end of the Action that caused it to become Broken.

commandSpecialRules.name: Ideal Card Flexibility
commandSpecialRules.description: The Regiment can be Activated and gain the effects of any Ideal Card Regardless of the Regiment's Battlefield Role.

specialRules.name: Lethal Demise
specialRules.description: For every Wound allocated to a Stand with this Special Rule as a result of a failed Defense Roll, the Enemy Regiment in contact with the Stand's Regiment that caused the Hits suffers a Hit.

specialRules.name: Enlightened
specialRules.description: The first time this Regiment would become Broken during the Battle, the Regiment performs an out-of-sequence Rally or Combat Rally Action at the end of the Action that caused it to become Broken.

commandSpecialRules.name: Volley Defense
commandSpecialRules.description: When this Regiment becomes the Target of an Enemy Regiment's Volley Action it gains the Tenacious (2) Special Rule until the end of that Action. Origami Warrior Stands being destroyed do not count towards the Regiment becoming Broken.

specialRules.name: Flurry
specialRules.description: A Stand with this Special Rule Re-Rolls all failed Hit Rolls when performing a Clash or Duel Action.

specialRules.name: Impact (2)
specialRules.description: When this Stand performs a successful Charge Action, before its Clash Action, it inflicts a number of automatic Hits equal to its Impact value.

specialRules.name: Unstoppable
specialRules.description: This Regiment may Re-Roll failed Charge Rolls.

specialRules.name: Visage
specialRules.description: Friendly Regiments can draw Line of Sight through this Regiment. When this Regiment becomes the Target of an Enemy Regiment's Volley Action it gains the Tenacious (2) Special Rule until the end of that Action.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

name: Shikigami

specialRules.name: Fearless
specialRules.description: A Regiment with this Special Rule ignores the effects of the Fearsome and Terrifying (X) Special Rules.

specialRules.name: Unstoppable
specialRules.description: This Regiment may Re-Roll failed Charge Rolls.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

specialNotes: This Regiment cannot be joined by a [Character] Stand. Stands in this Regiment counts as being Size 1.

name: Dai Yokai

specialRules.name: Cleave (1)
specialRules.description: Enemy Stands in contact with this Stand reduce their Defense Characteristic by 1 when making Defense rolls against Hits inflicted by this Stand.

specialRules.name: Fearless
specialRules.description: A Regiment with this Special Rule ignores the effects of the Fearsome and Terrifying (X) Special Rules.

specialRules.name: Impact (5)
specialRules.description: When this Stand performs a successful Charge Action, before its Clash Action, it inflicts a number of automatic Hits equal to its Impact value.

specialRules.name: Terrifying (1)
specialRules.description: Regiments in contact with Stands with this Special Rule reduce their Resolve Characteristic by 1 for the purposes of making Morale Tests.

specialRules.name: Vanguard (3)
specialRules.description: When a Regiment with this Special Rule enters the Battlefield from Reinforcements, add +3 to its March Characteristic for the first March Action this Activation.

specialRules.name: Unstoppable
specialRules.description: This Regiment may Re-Roll failed Charge Rolls.

specialRules.name: Sweeping Step
specialRules.description: This Action can only be performed as the Regiment's first Action. The Dai Yokai immediately performs a March up to 12" directly forward ignoring all intervening Regiments and [Character]'s.

battlefieldRole: [Ka], [Chi], [Fu], [Sui] and [Mu] - Same as Warlord's Battlefield Role
specialNotes: This Regiment can perform a free Duel Action during its Activation as if it was a [Character].

name: Genya no Yokai

specialRules.name: Cleave (3)
specialRules.description: Enemy Stands in contact with this Stand reduce their Defense Characteristic by 3 when making Defense rolls against Hits inflicted by this Stand.

specialRules.name: Fearless
specialRules.description: A Regiment with this Special Rule ignores the effects of the Fearsome and Terrifying (X) Special Rules.

specialRules.name: Impact (7)
specialRules.description: When this Stand performs a successful Charge Action, before its Clash Action, it inflicts a number of automatic Hits equal to its Impact value.

specialRules.name: Terrifying (1)
specialRules.description: Regiments in contact with Stands with this Special Rule reduce their Resolve Characteristic by 1 for the purposes of making Morale Tests.

specialRules.name: Vanguard (3)
specialRules.description: When a Regiment with this Special Rule enters the Battlefield from Reinforcements, add +3 to its March Characteristic for the first March Action this Activation.

specialRules.name: Unstoppable
specialRules.description: This Regiment may Re-Roll failed Charge Rolls.

specialRules.name: Enlightening Fury
specialRules.description: Every time the Genya no Yokai gains the benefits of an Ideal Card it keeps those effects until the end of the Battle.

battlefieldRole: [Ka], [Chi], [Fu], [Sui] and [Mu] - Same as Warlord's Battlefield Role
